author: Staff Reporter
text:
: Authorities of Oulgaret Municipality on Friday attached the property of a defaulter located in Villianur for failing to pay tax. They have also warned of attaching and sealing property of others who fail to pay property tax.

The municipal administration had issued notices to the defaulter asking him to clear the dues to the tune of Rs.1.68 lakh in 2001 itself. The municipality is facing a financial crunch due to property tax arrears. There are about 20,000 defaulters with the Oulgaret Municipality and Rs. 7 crore remain as arrears, Commissioner Ramesh said.
title: Property of defaulter attached
